characters: Driver of a silver sedan, driver of a black car
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a highway. A red car is seen on the right side initially, followed by a series of vehicles ahead. The silver sedan in front of the self-driving vehicle suddenly slows down, causing the self-driving vehicle to decelerate rapidly to avoid a collision.
actions: The self-driving vehicle decelerates rapidly due to the sudden slowing down of the silver sedan ahead. The vehicle maintains a safe distance from the silver sedan, adjusting its speed accordingly.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A red car, approximately 2 meters away, moving parallel to the self-driving vehicle. 2) Front: A silver sedan, approximately 5 meters away, suddenly slowing down, causing the self-driving vehicle to decelerate rapidly. 3) Left side: A black car, approximately 10 meters away, moving parallel to the self-driving vehicle.
